text: Poly (IC) and/or poly (ICLC) has been shown to be effective in rodents, primates and the marine crustacean Litopenaeus vannamei [96] . Protection has been observed against influenza virus [90] , Rift Valley fever virus [16] , rabies virus [97] , Punta Toro virus [98] , Herpes simplex virus type 2 [99] , western equine encephalitis virus [100] , Venezuelan equine encephalomyelitis virus [101] , yellow fever virus [102] , SARS-Co-V [81] , RSV [103] , white spot syndrome virus and Taura syndrome virus [96] . Poly (IC) has also been shown, through its effects on NK cells, to eliminate the histological lesions of graft-versus-host disease in mice [104] .
